embed.title: Message Content Intent
embed.description:
Discord requires you to have Message Content Intents enabled for EssentialsX Discord to work properly. You can enable the privileged intent by going to your bot application's page on the Discord Developer portal, then navigating to `Bot > Privileged Gateway Intents` and turning on `Message Content Intent`. Once you restart your server, EssentialsX Discord will be able to read messages from your Discord server once again. 
For more information, see [this message](https://ptb.discord.com/channels/390942438061113344/426460619277991936/1015033747185356810)
